pli-tv-bi-vb-pj5:1.11: kuṭhāriṃ → kuddālaṃ (bj); kudhāriṃ (mr) | parasuṃ → pharasuṃ (bj, s1-3, pts1, mr)
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj5:1.50: santuṭṭhassa → santuṭṭhiyā (pts1, mr); asantuṭṭhitāya → asantuṭṭhiyā (bj, pts1, mr); asantuṭṭhatāya (s1-3)
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj5:2.3.10: Paṭhamapārājikaṃ samattaṃ → paṭhamapārājikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (bj, s1-3); bhikkhunīvibhaṅge paṭhamapārājikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ (pts1)
